[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces”][vc_column]

You can't always be there
But we can.

We offer a person-centred approach to keep seniors safe
and sound at home, instead of anywhere else.

Caregiver jobsRequest an appointment

Extraordinary Every day.

Providing quality care services.

Our home care services [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces”][vc_column][vc_column_text]Below are some of the services we offer.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”5/6″][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]

Everybody prefers staying at home than go into a health care facility or nursing home?

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][vc_separator color=”custom” border_width=”2″ accent_color=”#34beb9″ css=”.vc_custom_1489664388905{margin-top: 10px !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”25px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”3/6″][vc_column_text]Enhanced Carers will provide the following home care programs at flexible schedules and cost-friendly service rates.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”25px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/6″][vc_column_text]

View care services

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”80px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” parallax=”content-moving” parallax_image=”167″ css=”.vc_custom_1489666847691{padding-top: 200px !important;padding-bottom: 150px !important;background-color: #191919 !important;background-position: center;background-repeat: no-repeat;background-size:cover !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/4″]

Home Care Services

When someone you love is ill, finding high-quality care is your top priority. At Enhanced Carers, we understand that being in a familiar environment can enhance the quality of life and help to preserve dignity. That’s why we’re committed to providing compassionate, reliable, in-home professional assistance.

Home Care Services

Continue
[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″]
Hospital Private Care

As much as we would like our loved ones to be cared for in the privacy and security of their own homes, they may need attention requiring the services of a nursing home, retirement residence, rehabilitation, or long-term care facility.

Hospital Private Care

Continue
[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″]
Facility Staffing

Although hospitals, nursing homes, and other long-term health care facilities are facing budget constraints like never before, we know that providing the highest quality of care for your patients is always your top priority.

Facility Staffing

Continue
[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″]
Transportation Services

Helping you get where you need to go.

Enhanced Carers Transport is more than just taking you to and from those urgent medical appointments, we are here to help you retain your personal freedom and get you back in touch with your local community.

Our fleet of vehicles includes buses, people movers and small four-door cars to meet your needs.

Transportation Services

Continue
[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1489666670503{margin-top: -80px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs][vc_tta_section title=”What is a caregiver?” tab_id=”1489666618438-d65644d3-e4be”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

A Caregiver is someone who is compassionate, reliable, knowledgeable, and most importantly, trustworthy. Enhanced Carers leads the industry in finding the absolute best Caregivers to provide seniors with assistance at home, giving their families peace of mind.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]

View Our CaregiverView Care Services

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Senior care industry analysis” tab_id=”1489666618584-6dad8827-e60c”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” gap=”30″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_line_chart legend=”” x_values=”04; 05; 06; 07; 08; 09; 10; 11; 12; 13″ values=”%5B%7B%22title%22%3A%22Title%22%2C%22y_values%22%3A%229.4%3B%2010.3%3B%2011.4%3B%2012.5%3B%2013.8%3B%2015.1%3B%2016.6%3B%2018.3%3B%2020.1%3B%2022.2%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22turquoise%22%7D%5D”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

An Exceptional Business Opportunity

The in-home senior care services industry will experience significant growth over the next 40 years. In 2013 the market for in-home senior care is projected to reach approximately $22 billion*, exhibiting a decade-long average compound annual growth rate of 10%. This industry is in its infancy. In today’s business environment, how many industries can you identify that can feasibly project this growth rate?[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” gap=”30″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Population Trends and Demand Drivers

Today, there are 40 million adults† age 65+ in the U.S. What’s more, this population is expected to nearly double to 70 million over the next 30 years. With an increasing average life expectancy for Americans reaching over 75 years of age, the need for senior care will continue to escalate.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_line_chart x_values=”2000; 2010; 2020; 2030; 2040; 2050″ values=”%5B%7B%22title%22%3A%2285%2B%20Years%22%2C%22y_values%22%3A%224.2%3B%206.1%3B%207.3%3B%209.6%3B%2015.4%3B%2020.9%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22turquoise%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%2265%2B%20Years%22%2C%22y_values%22%3A%2235%3B%2040.2%3B%2054.6%3B%2071.5%3B%2080%3B%2086.7%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22mulled-wine%22%7D%5D”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”How to start your care?” tab_id=”1490084105509-c37190fd-76be”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_empty_space height=”10px”]

  • Call and speak to one of our friendly team who will discuss the setup process and outline our packages.
  • Request a home visit where we will provide you with a free, no obligation assessment.
  • Once agreed, we will setup your care package and introduce you to your Care Worker.
[vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]

Request an AppointmentHotline: 01 800 688 8688

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1489672282895{background-color: #eef2f6 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/6″][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_column_text]

Why choose nano home care?

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_separator color=”custom” border_width=”2″ accent_color=”#34beb9″ css=”.vc_custom_1490690444868{margin-top: 10px !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”25px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”7/12″][vc_column_text]We are committed to being your shoulder to lean on and providing honest advice for your loved one’s situation during this delicate time.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”25px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_column_text]

Read Testimonials

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Daily care experts

We specialize in around the clock care to help seniors live well at home.

[vc_empty_space height=”30px”]
Peace of mind

Independent industry surveys place our client satisfaction rate at 97%.

[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]
Available 24/7

We are available 24 hours a day to provide your loved one with a caregiver.

[vc_empty_space height=”30px”]
A trusted partner

Nano Home Care is the trusted referral choice for elder care professionals.

[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]
Balanced care

Our unique approach to care promotes healthy mind, body and spirit.

[vc_empty_space height=”30px”]
Cognitive therapeutics

Fun yet effective activities designed by experts to keep aging minds sharp

[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]
high caliber caregivers

We typically hire only 1 in 25 applicants and provide ongoing training.

[vc_empty_space height=”30px”]
No long term contract

Use our services only as long as you’re 100% satisfied.

[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/6″][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_column_text]

Stay up to date with the latest news & press releases.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_separator color=”custom” border_width=”2″ accent_color=”#34beb9″ css=”.vc_custom_1489664388905{margin-top: 10px !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”25px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”7/12″][vc_column_text]Pro­vides gen­eral infor­ma­tion and dis­cus­sion to promote broad consumer understanding and knowledge about various health-related topics.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”25px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_column_text]
